headers.subject: [tosdr:2907] Twitch [Bad] No notice of changing terms to user - user expected to check - unclear on recurring pay

subject: Twitch [Bad] No notice of changing terms to user - user expected to check - unclear on recurring pay
text:
Twitch.tv Terms of Sale
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=terms_of_sale

Topic: Notice of Changing Terms

> These Terms of Sale are subject to change without prior written notice at any time, in Twitchâ€™s sole discretion, and such changes shall apply to any purchases made after such changes are posted to the Site. Therefore, you should review these Terms of Sale prior to each purchase so you will understand the terms applicable to such transaction. If you do not agree to these Terms of Sale, do not make any purchases on the Twitch Service.

Expect the user to check terms again before each recurring purchase. No notice is sent to the user when the terms change.

It is unclear how recurring payments (subscriptions) count as a new purchase on each payment and the user would thus have to check the terms each time.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
